resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105629</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105629</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Game-Based Learning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel-Gegründetes Lernen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude Jeu-Basée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem Jogo-Baseada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparare Gioco-Basato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι-βασισμένος εκμάθηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Aprender Juego-Basado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Starting Point module is written to assist geoscience faculty who want to start using games to help them teach. It provides information on what Game-Based Learning is, why it is useful, how to make use of it and an annotated list of references and resources about Game-Based Learning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Vorlage geoscience Lehrkörper dieses 
Ausgangspunktmodul wird geschrieben, das Spiele zu verwenden, beginnen
möchten, um ihnen zu helfen zu unterrichten. Es stellt 
Informationen auf zur Verfügung, was Spiel-Gründete das Lernen ist, 
warum es nützlich ist, wie man es und eine angemerkte Liste von 
Referenzen und von Betriebsmitteln über das Spiel-Gegründete Lernen 
gebraucht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce module de point de départ est écrit au corps 
enseignant de geoscience d'aide qui veulent commencer employer des 
jeux pour les aider à enseigner. Il fournit des informations 
sur ce qui Jeu-A basé l'étude est, pourquoi il est utile, comment se
servir d'elle et d'une liste annotée de références et de ressources
sur l'étude Jeu-Basée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este módulo do ponto começar é escrito à 
faculdade do geoscience da assistência que quer começar usar jogos 
lhes ajudar ensinar. Fornece a informação em o que Jogo-Baseou
a aprendizagem é, porque é útil, como empregar a e uma lista 
anotada das referências e dos recursos sobre a aprendizagem 
Jogo-Baseada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo modulo del punto di partenza è scritto 
alla facoltà di geoscience di aiuto che desidera iniziare a usando i 
giochi per aiutarli ad insegnare. Fornisce le informazioni su 
che cosa Gioco-Ha basato imparare è, perchè è utile, come usare 
esso e una lista annotata dei riferimenti e delle risorse circa 
imparare Gioco-Basato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ενότητα αφετηρίας γράφεται για να βοηθήσει την
ικανότητα geoscience που θέλει να αρχίσει τα παιχνίδια για να 
τους βοηθήσει να διδάξουν. Παρέχει τις πληροφορίες για αυτό
που η παιχνίδι-βασισμένη εκμάθηση είναι, γιατί είναι χρήσιμο, 
πώς να χρησιμοποιήσει το και έναν σχολιασμένο κατάλογο αναφορών 
και στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για την παιχνίδι-βασισμένη εκμάθηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este módulo del punto de partida se escribe a la 
facultad del geoscience de la ayuda que desea comenzar a usar juegos 
para ayudarles a enseñar. Proporciona a la información en qué
Juego-Baso' aprender es, porqué es útil, cómo hacer uso lo y una 
lista anotada de referencias y de recursos sobre aprender 
Juego-Basado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:REBECCA TEED
FN:REBECCA TEED
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105629</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/game-based-learning</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
